sprint_goal: Ship an MVP of stand-up insights and tighten access control on the dashboard.

issues.summary: Ingest Teams stand-up transcripts into SprintCompass
issues.description: Build a service that accepts daily Teams stand-up transcripts (as text files) and stores them with date, participants, and sprint metadata.
acceptance_criteria: Given a valid transcript file for a stand-up, when the ingestion job runs, then the file is stored with date and sprint metadata.
PM can query transcripts for a given date range via internal API.
Malformed or empty transcripts are rejected with a clear error log.

issues.summary: Parse transcripts into per-person updates, blockers, and actions
issues.description: Extend the ingestion pipeline to parse daily stand-up transcripts and extract per-person yesterday/today/blockers plus follow-up actions.
acceptance_criteria: For each participant in the transcript, updates are grouped under yesterday, today, and blockers where available.
Follow-up actions with clear owners are extracted into a structured list.
Parsed output is stored in a format consumable by the Scrum Buddy agent.

issues.summary: Build stand-up summary widget for SprintCompass dashboard
issues.description: Create a UI widget that shows the latest stand-up summary by person: closed items, in-progress items, and blockers.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard shows each team member with counts of done / in progress / blockers for the last stand-up.
Clicking a person opens detailed notes for yesterday, today, and blockers.
Widget supports dark mode and responsive layout.

issues.summary: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) for dashboard views
issues.description: Add RBAC to ensure only authorized users (PM, PO) can see certain metrics such as individual velocity and risk flags.
acceptance_criteria: Roles defined for PM, Engineer, QA, and Stakeholder.
Unauthorized users cannot access restricted widgets or APIs.
Access violations are logged with user, endpoint, and time.

issues.summary: Regression and exploratory testing for Sprint 4 features
issues.description: Run regression and exploratory testing for transcript ingestion, parsing, and dashboard visualization for stand-up insights and RBAC.
acceptance_criteria: Regression suite passes for core flows.
Critical and high bugs are triaged and linked to this story.
Test notes for exploratory testing are attached to the ticket.

issues.summary: Bug: Stand-up widget shows wrong sprint for some dates
issues.description: Fix bug where the stand-up summary widget sometimes labels a stand-up as the wrong sprint when dates are near sprint boundaries.
acceptance_criteria: Stand-ups within a sprint’s start and end dates always map to the correct sprint.
Off-by-one date errors at boundaries are covered by automated tests.
PO validates the mapping on staging with at least three sprint examples.
